document.full_text: years after old-fashioned, mass-market tv broadcasting was declared dead by some trendy internet types, rtl is still pulling in big audiences, mostly with low-cost reality programs.
document.title: bet on television pays off for rtl's zeiler
lines_and_colors: years after old-fashioned, mass-market tv broadcasting was declared dead by some trendy internet types, rtl is still pulling in big audiences, mostly with low-cost reality programs.
